p: A variety of pharmacological activities have been exhibited by different extracts of Cocculus hirsutus, such as anti-diabetic activity [ 92], antihyperglycemic activity [ 93], anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects [ 94, 95], antimicrobial activity [ 96], diuretic activity, and laxative effects in different experiments [ 97]. The plant is well documented as a spermatogenic [ 92].
